First Standard Title Limited (FSTL)

Nigeria’s Pioneer Title Risk Intelligence & Mortgage-Readiness Authority

First Standard Title Limited (FSTL) provides professional title risk assessment and mortgage-readiness certification for land and landed property in Nigeria.

We support individual land buyers, property developers, and financial institutions by identifying legal, documentary, historical, and transactional risks before purchase, financing, or development.

Core Professional Services

Title Risk Assessment Report (TRAR™)

The Title Risk Assessment Report (TRAR™) is a structured professional analysis that identifies defects, competing claims, documentation gaps, regulatory exposure, and transaction risks attached to a property title.

Mortgage Readiness & Title Cleanliness Certification (MRTC™)

The Mortgage Readiness & Title Cleanliness Certification (MRTC™) confirms that a property title meets the legal and risk standards required for mortgage financing, institutional investment, or structured development.

Pricing is determined by title complexity and risk exposure — not by property size.

Value Delivered by FSTL

What We Prevent

  • Acquisition of land with defective or competing titles
  • Mortgage rejection due to unresolved title issues
  • Post-purchase litigation and government revocation
  • Capital loss arising from undisclosed encumbrances

What We Enable

  • Clear, independent title risk intelligence
  • Decision-grade reports for buyers and institutions
  • Cleaner, faster, and defensible property transactions
  • A reliable foundation for financing and development

National Title Insurance Company of Nigeria (NATICON)

The National Title Insurance Company of Nigeria (NATICON) is a national-scale title insurance framework being pioneered by First Standard Title Limited (FSTL).

NATICON is currently awaiting formal approval from the Federal Government of Nigeria. The framework is being developed based on FSTL’s live title risk operations, market intelligence, and institutional experience.
